messages.subject: Happy Birthday UB!!!
messages.msgSnippet: I just got back from the conference a little while ago and realized that Kelly and I forgot to wish the list a Happy 2 Year Birthday yesterday!!:) We meant to
messages.messageBody:
I just got back from the conference a little while ago and realized
that Kelly and I forgot to wish the list a Happy 2 Year Birthday
yesterday!!:)

We meant to post about it, but we were having a crazy, happy, busy and
fun time at the conference in Peabody and didn't have time.

Unschooling Basics turned two years old yesterday. We've gone from
around 35 members that first day, to 942 members as of today. Glad
you're all here and participating in the very LONG and ongoing
dialogue about unschooling.

A special thanks to our moderators, Rue and Deb and all of our
long-timers that keep things focused on the list's purpose.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
